amendment.description: To improve cybersecurity in the United States through enhanced sharing of information about cybersecurity threats.

action.text: Amendment SA 1921 was rendered moot when its language was accepted as part of a modification to Amendment SA 1569.
Amendment SA 1921 proposed by Senator Burr to Amendment SA 1569.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1921 proposed by Senator Burr to Amendment SA 1569.
